name: Project Crimson (Destin715)
description:
Project Crimson is a 2D arcade clicker where your movement is restricted to a straight line in front of you. Use objects scattered throughout the arena to manipulate your movement and, with some luck and good timing, fly through 75 levels of fun and satisfying challenges where your reaction time will be tested. No advertisements, no microtransactions.

  • 75 Levels Of Satisfying Obstacles
  • Challenge Your GAMER SKILLS By Achieving Varying Levels of Score Goals
  • Customize Your Avatar with Unlockable Colors
  • Planned Free Update to Include an Endless Mode
  • I Really Hate These Marketing Bullet Points...

This game was made almost exclusively by one person (me) with some help from friends here or there. You can check out the game's awesome composer (not me) on Spotify here.

If you want to keep up with me, my future games (there will be more), or need a decent Twitter account to follow, you can find me @Destin715 on Twitter.

I am deeply grateful to anyone who deems my game worth any amount of time played - THANK YOU!
